title.native: キミと僕の最後の戦場、あるいは世界が始まる聖戦 Season II
title.romaji: Kimi to Boku no Saigo no Senjou, Aruiwa Sekai ga Hajimaru Seisen Season II
title.english: Our Last Crusade or the Rise of a New World Season 2

description:
The second season of Kimi to Boku no Saigo no Senjou, Aruiwa Sekai ga Hajimaru Seisen.

Iska guards Sisbell, sparking Alice's jealousy. Amid a conspiracy, can they thwart personal disputes and war?

(Source: Crunchyroll News)

tags.name: War
tags.description: Partly or completely set during wartime.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Witch
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a witch.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Politics
tags.description: Centers around politics, politicians, or government activities.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

node.description:
__[Profile (Aria Entertainment)](https://www.ariamusic.co.jp/elements-garden/)__

A Japanese group of music composers, or a "music production brand" as they call themselves. They generally produce music for video games, anime and recording artists. They are attached to Aria Entertainment.

__Current Members:__ 
[Noriyasu Agematsu](https://anilist.co/staff/103633/Noriyasu-Agematsu) (Producer/Lyricist/Composer)
[Junpei Fujita](https://anilist.co/staff/110557/Junpei-Fujita) (Producer/Composer/Arranger)
[Hitoshi Fujima](https://anilist.co/staff/101273/Hitoshi-Fujima) (Composer/Arranger)
[Daisuke Kikuta](https://anilist.co/staff/147815/Daisuke-Kikuta) (Composer/Arranger)
[Seima Iwahashi](https://anilist.co/staff/146530/Seima-Iwahashi) (Composer/Arranger/Director)
[Ryutaro Fujinaga](https://anilist.co/staff/155960/Ryutaro-Fujinaga) (Lyricist/Composer)
[Ryota Tomaru](https://anilist.co/staff/140532/Ryota-Tomaru) (Composer/Arranger)
[Yuta Kasai](https://anilist.co/staff/259881/Yuuta-Kasai) (Composer/Arranger)
[Yusuke Takeda](https://anilist.co/staff/156645/Yusuke-Takeda) (Lyricist/Composer)
[Asuka Oda](https://anilist.co/staff/155968/Asuka-Oda) (Lyricist)
[Seima Kondou](https://anilist.co/staff/239286/Seima-Kondou) (Composer/Arranger)

__Former Members:__ 
Yasutomo Nakai (2005-2006)
[Masato Nakayama](https://anilist.co/staff/112097/Masato-Nakayama) (2007-2013)
[Evan Call](https://anilist.co/staff/119999/Evan-Call) (2012-2016)
Tomohiro Kita (2011-2016), Haruki Mori (2009-2018)
[Ryouta Suemasu](https://anilist.co/staff/155969/Ryouta-Suemasu) (2014-2019)

[Website](http://www.alialive.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/alia___official) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/alia___official/) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/alia20180723/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/c/AliAofficial/videos)

__Formed:__ 2018 

__Introduction:__
AliA is a Japanese six-piece rock band, who debuted on July, 2018 with their mini album _AliVe_.

__Members:__
- [AYAME](https://anilist.co/staff/326046) – vocalist
- RINA – violinist
- SEIYA – bassist
- [TKT](https://anilist.co/staff/209375/TKT) – keyboardist, lyricist
- [Eren Okamura](https://anilist.co/staff/209376/Eren-Okamura) (岡村エレン), better known as EREN (エレン) – guitarist, lyricist and composer
- BOB – drummer

__[Profile](http://www.ariamusic.co.jp/elements-garden/fujita/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Junpei_Fujita)__

Member of the "music production brand" Elements Garden.

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/tadanonatsu)__

Natsumi Tadano is a Japanese lyricist.
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Sizuk_official) | [Bio](https://sizuk.co.jp/artists/shunryu/) Shunryuu is a Japanese composer affiliated with Sizuk Entertainment.
__TKT__ is a Japanese keyboardist, lyricist and member of the band [AliA](https://anilist.co/staff/209374/AliA).

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/eren_okamura) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/eren_okamura/)__

__Eren Okamura__, better known as Eren, is a Romanian and Japanese born guitarist, lyricist, composer and member of the band [AliA](https://anilist.co/staff/209374/AliA).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Kyokilla)

Jared Smith is an American YouTuber and voice actor.

[Instagram](https://Instagram.com/fabioreallyfast/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/FabioCamposDub) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/fabio.campos.3511)

Fábio Campos is a Brazilian actor, voice actor, dubbing director and musician.

As dubbing director, he has worked at DuBrasil since 2014, and is also a professor in the studio's dubbing course. He also works as a musician, being a bassist in the group Speed ​​Bullets Trio.

__Non-Anime Roles:__
~!- Takeda Takahashi (Mortal Kombat X)
- José Manuel Esquivel "Chema" (Grachi)
- Marlon (The Walking Dead: The Final Season)
- Saber (Mobile Legends: Bang Bang)
- Agent Ned Ross (NCIS: Hawai'i)
- Peter Porker / Spider-Ham and Two-Gun Kid (LEGO Marvel Super Heroes 2)
- El Chavo del Ocho (El Chavo video game)
- Joshua "Josh" Wilson / White Josh (Crazy Ex-Girlfriend)
!~

[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/lulihorta) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/lulihorta)

Luísa Horta is a Brazilian actress, voice actress, and dubbing director.

__Non-Anime Roles:__
~!- Kirra Foster / Skye (Valorant)
- Female Protagonist (Tower of Fantasy)
- Savannah Miller (The Circle EUA)
- Mary Anne (2nd dub; The Baby-Sitters Club)
- Kira Yukimura (Sony's dub; Teen Wolf)
- Alicia (Stuck 2017)
- Liz Cheney (Vice)
- Oh Hui-Ji (A Love So Beautiful)
!~
